title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

  • Directional selection against individuals with large numbers of spots

  • Directional selection for individuals with fewer spots

  • Natural selection used in context

  • Genetic drift resulted in several generations of decreased numbers of spots
descriptions:
